term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - brightness of a laser dye
term.title: brightness

item.text: Product of the fluorescencequantum yield (Φ f) of a dye and the molar decadic absorption coefficient at the excitation wavelength, ɛ(λ), i.e., Φ f ɛ λ.

item.meaning: Molar decadic absorption coefficient at wavelength λ

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 293. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry, 3rd edition (IUPAC Recommendations 2006)' on page 310 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779030293)
